name: The Legend Of The Fallen Castle
name_original: The Legend Of The Fallen Castle
description:
Knight Astolphus suddenly awakens from a century of sleep in the bowels of a rotten castle. His hands firmly hold the sword and shield, which he cannot remove. He does not remember how he ended up in the rubble of the former royal castle. The only thing that is clear is that he will not be able to get out of this place just like that. As it turns out, an evil magician is involved in this, who wants to destroy the world. Your goal is to stop him.  --------------------------------------------------------- The Legend of the Fallen Castle is a 2D action platformer.
Waiting for you:
- fun exploration of 8 intricate levels.
- Collecting coins, thanks to which you can buy luck cards, which boosts the abilities of the main character. Also, you will have 2 mini-bosses waiting for you, which are the minions of the evil magician and the battle with the Dark magician.
